ValidationRule.description: Once a NA Credit is approved, the Estimated Dollar Amount and the Amount Before Tax fields can not be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", RecordType.Name = 'PGi-Credit Request', Credit_Committee_Approved__c = True, OR( (ISCHANGED( Amount_Before_Tax__c )), (ISChanged ( Estimated_Dollar_Amount__c ))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once approved, the Estimated Dollar Amount and the Amount (Before Tax) can not be changed.
